text:
As once again 👇we see a case of #chloroquine being used in a 'severe' case for #COVID19 💊 #treatment

I know it is #antiviral

But can anyone - unequivocally - tell me there are no #immunomodulatory properties to chloro. that help 'calm' immune system?

https://t.co/pOHOr4rzNZ https://t.co/VW5bxgRhJR
